Review.Titre: I saw absolutely no use for it despite…
Review.Contenu: I saw absolutely no use for it despite the trainings and high hopes it was gonna turn things around for us.

Review.Titre: There really wasn't help for set ups
Review.Contenu: There really wasn't help for set ups. There was no one to call or talk with to help with specific questions. I was a one person show but the system only went over how to use in a team. There are so many videos but they didn't match up with how the dashboard look like. Very hard to understand all the functions and reading the articles weren’t helpful.

Review.Titre: Been unsubscribing from Reisift for…
Review.Contenu: Been unsubscribing from Reisift for about a year plus and still keep getting spam emails. Many ways to do what the software offers at a lower cost.

Review.Titre: You guys suck
Review.Contenu: You guys suck, your service is crap and well Im not sure if you even know how to do Real Estate... and Tyler is a total ASS

Review.Titre: Stop emailing me
Review.Contenu: Stop  emailing me

Review.Titre: I asked for a refund and you won't give…
Review.Contenu: I asked for a refund and you won't give it. So now I have paid for a second year when I asked you not to charge me again a year ago. I would not call that good customer service, would you? Also, making me sign to accept your terms before I can leave a review doesn't seem fair or ethical either. I want people to know that if they pay for a year because it's cheaper, they have no recourse if they decide 3 days later they don't want reisift. Thank you

Review.Titre: Complicated.
Good product for the money but it takes…
Review.Contenu: Good product for the money but it takes a commitment to get it set up Maybe they will come up with a plug and play in the future

Review.Titre: Ok product, overpriced, owner unprofessional
Review.Contenu: I like the software, but I think it’s overpriced for what I use it for. I don’t do any cold calling which, if you do this marketing strategy, I think you would benefit from. Maybe they could have less features for users like me at a lower price. Beyond that, they have a pretty good community that is helpful at times, but I do think the owner of the company(who is very vocal) is unprofessional. If anyone were to leave a bad review of the company, he will most likely blast it to his Facebook group.I really do not want to spread negativity about the product because I do think it is useful. I use a CRM within my business that has way more functionality, but is lacking on the data management aspect so this is where REISift comes into play. Here is the main difference I see. And let me say, it has nothing to do with the product itself. There are Facebook communities around both platforms. (Reisift and RESimpli) If you are a part of both of these communities, you will see a trend throughout. Reisift has a community with a lot of negativity while RESimpli is constantly catering to its users the best they can. RESimpli has an owner who genuinely cares about it’s users and their business. For example, he discounted everyone’s monthly subscription during the pandemic and has also sent gifts to all users out of gratitude. As you scroll through the different communities, one gives off positive vibes, while the other usually only negative. If it’s one thing I’ve learned throughout my entrepreneurial journey, it’s that the way you treat people directly correlates to how successful you are. Yes, hard work is a big part of it but the way you genuinely care about one another is what will take you to the next level. Now, does my CRM have its downsides? Of course, just like any other platform. But another difference I see is that one platform is thanking users for their suggestions while the other is criticizing them. The second my CRM (RESimpli) catches up on the data management side we will be transitioning. And we are so close to being there! And it’s not because of the platform itself…it’s because of the community. Because if REISift had a little more of a positive environment then I might stick with them no matter what. And might I get blasted for this review? It’s entirely possible. But it’s also possible that I change a life. Maybe I will change the world. You know what? This review might change the entire trajectory of this country. Bottom line…it’s not all about how hard you work, how much discipline you have, or how much you think you want to be successful. IT IS HOW MUCH YOU CARE! Care about others, and their business, and their overall success. And most can tell when a company is genuine and when one isn’t. Do you care about those around you? Let that sink in…If the world were to end today would you be satisfied with the legacy you left on this earth? Or would you be regretful about those you’ve left wondering…

Review.Titre: Got to know how to Utilize
Review.Contenu: I was not able to get much use out of the basic subscription. I did not know how to utilize the amount of tools provided. The upgraded subscriptions probably have better features. The CEO did reach out and explain how I could have utilized it more but I think the basic subscription should let you integrate a dialer. I do appreciate the CEO reaching out so I updated my original harsh review which could have been mainly on me not utilizing the basic subscription.

Review.Titre: Great Data Marketing Platform
Review.Contenu: Awesome data marketing platform built around data management as a whole. they continue to roll out features that increase the usefulness of the platform and I can not wait to see some of the new ones being rolled out.

Review.Titre: A lot of great features
Review.Contenu: A lot of great features, I just dont know how to apply it to myself

Review.Titre: Decent software
Review.Contenu: Decent software, good training in business and data management. Needs to include more directions/training that isn't video. Include more graphs and non-video education/training/directions. Not everyone learns by video.

Review.Titre: Above and Beyond
Review.Contenu: The customer service was above expectation and they provided me with a discount because I was low on funds.  They continue to follow up with us and ask how they can help us.

Review.Titre: The only CRM you will need
Review.Contenu: As a real estate investor, I'm always looking for resources that can help me make smarter investment decisions. REISift.io has become an invaluable tool in my business. It gives me quick and easy access to my database of property records that I am always updating daily. I can pull up detailed records and never miss an opportunity.

Review.Titre: This is hands down the best CRM in Real…
Review.Contenu: This is hands down the best CRM in Real Estate. The community is also amazing. I'm embarrassed to say how much I've spent on masterminds but its enough to tell you that the REISift community, and the REISift way of working data, is one of the best out there.

Review.Titre: RESift Is A Must Have
Review.Contenu: REISift has been a game-changer for my business. With their system, I was able to build a repeatable process for my property acquisitions. This level of organization provided invaluable insights into what gaps I had in my business and how to fix them. The ongoing support and training have been exceptional. I highly recommend REISift for any operation looking to scale efficiently.

Review.Titre: This software is hands down the key to…your future in real estate investing
Review.Contenu: This software is hands down the key to your sales and marketing team taking the next step to more clarity and seamless growth, Tyler is a master at explaining how all the features work and he personally has helped me for COUNTLESS hours with all the seemingly endless questions I have had. The clarity with which you will be able to see your data as a real estate professional is Truly priceless, with new features coming out consistently tailored to the needs of actual users its hard to put a price tag on the software. I highly recommend this product to everyone I know. Dont be lazy, take the time to learn it and it will change your business.

Review.Titre: REISift 5 stars on my books
Review.Contenu: I have been doing real estate wholesaling for 3 years now and have been using REISift for 1 year so far. This tool has transformed my business and marketing 10-fold. The product continues to improve with better features, processes and integrations. Thanks Attlee and REISift team.

Review.Titre: REISift is incredible!
Review.Contenu: REISift is an incredible data management and CRM tool if you actually take the time to learn and implement it into your real estate business. It will open your eyes to just how much money you are losing by having leads fall through the cracks of your business. It will literally take your business to the next level. On top of that the customer service is great, and the owner and staff are truly dedicated to seeing you succeed!

Review.Titre: Great company!
Review.Contenu: This CRM will changes your real estate business for the better. Owner is awesome and amazing

Review.Titre: REIsift is the truth.
Review.Contenu: REIsift is the truth - one of the best REI data management, CRM, and deal tracking systems out there. Wish we would've found it sooner. They're constantly working on new features and enhancements which is awesome - always getting better.

Review.Titre: REISift is an amazing marketing tool…
Review.Contenu: REISift is an amazing marketing tool for real estate investors.  It lets you focus your data to save thousands of dollars on your marketing budget.  It is also a great CRM that lets you see exactly what marketing channels you've used to contact leads.  And there is lots of videos and tech support to make sure you can learn how to use REISift to its fullest.

Review.Titre: REISIFT = Amazing
Review.Contenu: REISIFT is amazing tool! Not only is it easy to use, plus has all the best features that make it a great choice as my Top CRM, the customer service is top-notch and the team is always willing to help with any questions or issues. I highly recommend REISIFT to anyone! Its literally the TRUTH!!

Review.Titre: REISift gave me clarity and insight…
Review.Contenu: REISift gave me clarity and insight that no other product has even come close to doing. Whether you’re a big company or a one man show, REISift can help you scale and maximize your efficiency by showing you where your most valuable prospects are hidden so you can get to them first. Not to mention the product is constantly evolving along with its active facebook group which is filled with many helpful members. There is also a YouTube channel dedicated to even further clarify the tools and resources they have available. Need I say more…

Review.Titre: Excellent Software / Excellent Community Support.
Review.Contenu: This software/community is second to none.  I have looked at a lot of options and there is bar none, no one else who offers the level of commitment and practical advice offered here. I am working my way back through the trainings, learning lots, and finally getting a handle on my business.  I feel like I have been around the world trying to make a RE business work, REISift is definitely part of my path to the future.

Review.Titre: REI Sift is a total game changer for…
Review.Contenu: REI Sift is a total game changer for me. When it comes to managing my data effectively and marketing efficiently I’ve been using a lot of roundabout methods and tools that are extremely cumbersome. Think Podio with lots of add-ons, processes etc. Really convoluted. REISift totally changes the game, streamlines all of your data processing and lead management. I am super grateful.

Review.Titre: Best Community in Real Estate!!!!
Review.Contenu: I just want to say Reisift community is hands down the best in the Industry. Tyler does weekly coaching on how to use the platform. You have insite into your Data. You can also use it for a CRM. Amazing integration for call and texting platforms. The staff is the best in the industry and super helpful and knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: REISift is a complete game changer for…
Review.Contenu: REISift is a complete game changer for any and all things real estate. Being a wholesaler/rehabber, my data has never been in a better spot.No matter how my exit strategies or marketing strategies change, the one thing that will always be constant in my business is REISift.There is nothing like it out there.

Review.Titre: All Around Best Real Estate Platform!
Review.Contenu: Idk who would rate less than 5 stars. The REISift platform has changed the game for me. I thought I was successful in real estate until I realized how much time and resources I was wasting. Tyler shows you how to truly analyze your data instead of doing the shotgun approach and hoping something sticks. If you want to run a legitimate company I highly recommend signing up and especially following the reisift community. Everyone is super helpful and the system is constantly improving.

Review.Titre: ReiSift is the tool you never knew you needed until you have it
Review.Contenu: I've been using ReiSift for the past 2 years and all I can say is this is by far the BEST tool for real estate investors. Features just keep getting better and better! Between the knowledge base, courses, and youtube videos they punch out on a regular basis, you have enough to fully integrate Sift into your business. Not to mention their amazing community who are filled with a bunch of go-givers, always looking to help. It starts from the top, Tyler is always willing to give so much of his time and knowledge to help others be successful. Needless to say, I'm not going anywhere anytime soon.

Review.Titre: Sift has changed the REI space
Review.Contenu: Sift has changed the REI space. If you are already successful, you’ll save time, money, and gain clarity with your business. Or if you’re just starting out, start here instead of following what the countless gurus preach (throw money at mass marketing with no clarity). The software was great a year ago and so much value has been added since then. Nothing short of excellent.

Review.Titre: REISift is hands down the first…
Review.Contenu: REISift is hands down the first application to commit to and build your real estate businesses foundation upon.  The tool helps you understand your data/prospects better and how to properly market o those prospects.  If I started over…which I did😉…I would start with REISift!!!!!!The CEO, Tyler Austin, and the team and community he has built is hands down best in the business.  The best all-in one software, Training that explains step by step how to market properly, the REISIFT community that is so giving.  What are you waiting for???!!??  GET REISIFT NOW!!!!Thank you so much Tyler, REISift team, and REISift community!!!🙏🙏🙏Think3RE.com

Review.Titre: The best way to increase you Residential and Commercial Real Estate business
Review.Contenu: We are small entrepreneurs and we have been in REISift since we first heard about it 2 years ago. We immediately felt in love with the app, not only we were given several tools to expand our business but we were trained by an awesome team. REISift helped us understand our data way better and make small changes in our SOPs to increase productivity and find better deals. It didn't stop there, they kept launching new features and resources to make our life easier, with their courses we learned new techniques to reach prospect sellers faster and with little effort. REISift is very powerful and might sound hard to operate but on the contraire it's intuitive and very straight forward, and if you ever need help the support team is always easy to reach and super friendly.They have great subscription plans for all investor sizes but I recommend you go for the Professional or Business as you will payback that investment on your first deal.

Review.Titre: What I have been missing this entire time...
Review.Contenu: I have been looking for something that does EXACTLY what this software does for well over a year. I can't tell you how much time I wasted with spreadsheets, other software, etc. If I would have heard about and started using ReiSift when I started my investing journey, I can promise you that I would be leaps and bounds further than I am at this point. Thank you ReiSift!

Review.Titre: Mighty Mouse
Review.Contenu: Maybe I'm not the best reviewer because I learned about RE Marketing from the jump from Tyler, Zach and the whole REISift team over a year ago. It's the only Marketing and Data platform I've ever used and I don't see any reason I'd make any changes going forward. It's a clean, powerful, intuitive tool that keeps my whole business organized in one place. The community experience is also excellent! I've made so many valuable relationships inside the community that I know will pay dividends on both sides for years to come. There really is much more value here than I'm able to quantify in this review. I'm looking forward to the great developments and trainings that continue to issue from this small but mighty business!

Review.Titre: Simply Amazing Software
Review.Contenu: Simply Amazing Software. I signed up for Reisift when I realized I had spent over $600 skiptracing the same data multiple times. Since then, it has exceeded all my expectations with all the features and the community behind it.I currently use it as the single source of truth for all my real estate data, and love how much more insight I have into what's happening to the data and leads that I market to.Also having spent the last 6yrs of my career writing software for various tech companies, I'm very impressed by the level of thought and engineering that has gone into building reisift and plan to be a longterm user.

Review.Titre: They continue to improve and innovate…
Review.Contenu: They continue to improve and innovate and take feedback from users. They focus more on the things that matter vs fancy shiny objects. It's good for a crm and for managing data, and integrates directly with several different dialers and text blasting softwares, saving hundreds of dollars a month not needing Zapier. There is also a mastermind and teaching component, and the other users seem more advance than typical people in real estate and it's great connecting with other users.

Review.Titre: THE TRUTH!!
Review.Contenu: REISift is the single most important tool in our company. Tyler's understanding of sales and marketing is a huge bonus! I have been investing in Real Estate since 2014 and Sift has completely changed my mindset on sales and marketing.

Review.Titre: From "Nice to Have" to "Must Have"
Review.Contenu: What originally started out as a "nice to have" tool for our real estate business is quickly becoming a "must have". Could not operate at the efficiency we do without this system!

Review.Titre: REISift is what you need
Review.Contenu: REISift is the software you need and don't even know it yet. With a community filled with knowledge and strategies to elevate your Real Estate business, REISift is the go-to CRM hands down. Why spend more money on others when REISift will start saving you money from the beginning by giving you a better understanding of your data.

Review.Titre: This product is such a game changer
Review.Contenu: This product is such a game changer, but that’s not even the best part! The customer service, and dedicated team makes ReiSift a notch above the rest. Looking forward to improving together and growing into something to be proud of. Thanks guys!

Review.Titre: Back and Fourth
Review.Contenu: I started with REISift and left twice. My reason for leaving was I didn't understand what I had and the second reason for me leaving was product timing - I needed a CRM with phone capabilities and REI Sift was in the process of building some out.I will say this REISift makes you a trained data sniper specialist which helps you plan predictability within your data and be consistent. thanks, REI Sift team

Review.Titre: The Backbone of my REI Company
Review.Contenu: REISift is the most important tool in my REI company. Aside from list-stacking, the amount of clarity that I have in regards to my data allows me to not only save money, but gives me the ability to close bigger deals with less marketing spend. It’s the best REI tool out there hands down!

Review.Titre: REISift is a Great Tool if Set Up Properly
Review.Contenu: Edit: I've been using REISift now for a couple months as while it's not a perfect system, it does make my life much easier when it's configured correctly. With the Professional plan you can set up an API Integration to send lists directly to Readymode (Xencall) or CallTools and maybe others. I really REISift's support. They are always free to chat and deliver great customer service. Highly recommend REISift.

Review.Titre: Great software!
Review.Contenu: Great software!  The user interface is clean and easy to use.  I now know what kind of property data I have as well as who I've already marketed to and how/when that property was marketed.  No more maintaining multiple lists containing duplicate data and wasting marketing dollars.

Review.Titre: The CORE of our operation is REIsift
Review.Contenu: Hands down REIsift is one of the core tools I use in my company. I know for a fact we have used it to produce multiple six figures with very minimal marketing spend. All the while being able to hone in on our marketing efforts and figure out where the best bang for our buck is. Highly recommend using this product and excited to see where the company goes in the next few years.

Review.Titre: Just simply amazing
Review.Contenu: Going on almost a year with sift and I have nothing but good things to say, the system has saved me and my operation countless of money and they are always looking for ACTUAL user feedback and continuing to provide value and constant updates to improve and better our experience as users! Special shout out to Kylie one of the support and the entire support team for super quick help! Would highly recommend to anyone on the verge!

Review.Titre: Reisift is a absolute game changer
Review.Contenu: Reisift is a absolute game changer! If you want real insight into your data and a dedicated team of developers working their butt off to improve and make it better month after month. Look no further then Reisift!

Review.Titre: Tyler and his team are amazing
Review.Contenu: Tyler and his team are amazing. He has built not just a software for real estate investors but a community of people that all support each other and want everyone to succeed. Over the last 3 years I have had the pleasure of being able to watch Tyler grow his company and this amazing community. He is always coming out with new ideas to add to the software which make our jobs so much easier. Thank You Tyler for being you and I will always support anything you do.

Review.Titre: Fantastic platform!
Review.Contenu: I’ve been doing the data for dollars challenge and have been blown away with how awesome of a platform reisift is. If you’re interested in using the platform, I highly recommend doing the challenge. It’s been super helpful in walking me through what felt like an arduous task.

Review.Titre: Kylie and REI Sift have really been…
Review.Contenu: Kylie and REI Sift have really been Amazing service these last few months. They help us get in close deals in real estate. That's the bottom line. Kylie, goes above and beyond and has an Intelligent, Wonderful attitude... she recently, Was instrumental with a very technical integration (I am not techy)? The beta testing for a new Third party product had closed. Kylie called, and moved a whole mountain!!  Kylie got permission to join Pass the Deadline, which was crucial...  really helped my company. We needed it at the last minute. This company's REI SIFT is amazing. What more can I say? If you're in real estate (Are roofing contracting whatever) and you're not using REI Sift Then you don't know what you don't know. (more for me.. thanks)

Review.Titre: Best CRM / Sales And Marketing System Ever!!!
Review.Contenu: Reisift is bar none, the best Realestate CRM on the market today. It is more than that, it is a way of doing things that breaks your business down to a science. With all that being said it is not an easy button. You still have to have skills, you still have to execute and use your brain and put processes in place to use the software efficiently. The CEO and founder is working day in and day out to improve the product and to increase the number of lives he is able to impact by creating I dynamic company that is focused on helping all who are willing to put in the actual work to execute and use it in the way it is designed.

Review.Titre: Game Changer
Review.Contenu: This software is a game changer in the industry and will be the platform that launches my business and helps me crush my competitors. The founder/CEO is truly a go-giver and cares so much about seeing other succeed as long as they are willing to put in the work.

Review.Titre: Revolutionary Software
Review.Contenu: REISift is revolutionary solution for all real estate professional. It allows you to create an ecosystem for data and marketing. The platform along with the insight, training, Facebook community of the Sift team is game changer for clarity and strategy. The best software I’ve seen by far in the real estate industry.

Review.Titre: Everyone should incorporate Reisift in their business
Review.Contenu: Reisift is by far the best data management tool in the market. I highly recommend it for newbies and experienced real estate investors. Also, Tyler and his team provide tremendous value on a weekly basis because he genuinely wants you to succeed.

Review.Titre: Less time, more profits
Review.Contenu: I've made more money with Sift EASIER than with any other software tool out there. It's literally cut my workweek to a fraction without impacting my income so I can spend more time with friends and family.

Review.Titre: I've been using ReiSift now for about 8…
Review.Contenu: I've been using ReiSift now for about 8 months. It has improved my ability to get to the more "ideal" leads significantly. The customer service from the ReiSift team is unmatched. Anytime I had a question, someone from the team was able to answer me very quickly. Often times the owner will chime in to make sure that you are satisfied and will seek our ideas on how to improve.

Review.Titre: REISIFT has helped me make money
Review.Contenu: REISIFT has helped me make more money in my business by allowing me to focus in on prospects who are more likely looking to do business with us. Without REISIFT our cost of doing business would go up.

Review.Titre: BETTER THAN 5 STARS!!!!
Review.Contenu: The founder and his team are very knowledgeable and willing to share. They are building the best REI CRM in the universe and have given us incredible insight into how to structure our business to succeed.Happy and Astraes

Review.Titre: The Best Sales and Marketing Tool in Real Rstate
Review.Contenu: This is the best Sales and Marketing Tool in Real Estate. If you are serious about closing deals on a consistent basis you need to have REISift as the backbone of your business. If you are not using REISift you are missing out on a ton of insight in your business.

Review.Titre: Reisift is top notch
Review.Contenu: Reisift is excellent, many features that help really understand your data and who you are marketing to, also the integrations they have added have made many things in my business more simple also the training they provide on how to market to your data and really understand what you have is one of a kind. If your investing in real estate reisift is a must ! Highly recommend

Review.Titre: Love it!!!
Review.Contenu: Another business owner told me to check out Reisift and to do the challenges immediately and I did.  That was the best move for my business.  After doing the challenges I realized Reisift would be my secret weapon for success.  ReiSift has been a great community for advice and has always been evolving to the needs of the users.  I love it!!!

Review.Titre: The Best Real Estate Software and Community out there!
Review.Contenu: The REISift Software application and community both saved my business and put us on a path to multiple six figures annually. The software is easy to use with a comprehensive training library and support team at your fingertips. Some people pay thousands of dollars for real estate 'training', which is provided just for being a software user.Would recommend this software and community to anyone who is to learn real estate or actively grow their business.

Review.Titre: I love REISift
Review.Contenu: I love REISift, not because it has list stacking capabilities but because you can get granular with your data. By using REISift I have been able to understand and track who I've been able to get a hold of, who is not interested, who has sold, and who is a buyer in my market. I'm even able to track which numbers are correct number or disconnected numbers so I don't spend money and time marketing to the wrong people.REISift is more than your ordinary list stacker, it is our CRM.

Review.Titre: I hate to even think about life pre-REI…
Review.Contenu: I hate to even think about life pre-REI Sift. So many spreadsheets, so many inefficiencies, such little insight into our data.  REI Sift will change your business, but you have to take the time to learn to use it correctly. Their support is unparalleled  - for any software I've ever used. And they're just getting started.  Don't sleep on this one!

Review.Titre: Tyler can come off like an arrogant A.
Review.Contenu: Tyler can come off like an arrogant A.. But that probably stems from the military. This is some AMAZING software for anyone in real estate. I think it can be used for more than just investors. Anyone marketing to properties can use this

Review.Titre: Really great platform that truly shows…
Review.Contenu: Really great platform that truly shows you how to manage your data and marketing. It does have a bit of a learning curve but there are tons of videos on how to use the software and a community of users that will help with any questions you may have.

Review.Titre: I have been using REIsift for over 1…
Review.Contenu: I have been using REIsift for over 1 year and I have understood how beneficial it is to understand my data. I continue to learn and I love how involved Tyler is with the community. This product continues to improve and continues to provide amazing solutions and insight on the power your data has. Every serious investor should take the time to understand and use REIsift.

Review.Titre: Must have real estate tool
Review.Contenu: This is the best real estate tool out on the market. I have been in the real estate investment space for over 11 years and this is top notch tool. Tyler and his team continue to innovate as well and improve it all the time. If you want a platform that will preform you you and your business this is the rock solid base you need. It will give you a giant edge over your competition.

Review.Titre: Best Marketing application out there
Review.Contenu: Best Marketing application out there. Definitely more valuable than the sticker price. I would not trade it for anything. I really love it and it’s applications. It helps me understand my data and there is also courses to help you understand proper sequential marketing.
The team at REISift is changing the game for real estate sales and marketing as a whole. Literally changing lives out here. Can't recommend enough!

Review.Titre: I was not going to write a review
Review.Contenu: I was not going to write a review...I'm not good with words. I thought about it and decided I'm going to leave a review. Where do I begin? ever since I gave RE a shot, "Gurus" on the internet always preaching about "Data" is the key essential part of this business "pull a list, call and pull more list" but what am I really getting out of that? Ever since I came across REISIFT, my perspectives had changed on the ways that I viewed data and how cleaning, recycling, updating are very important on cutting down costs/time. They have a strong FB community,YouTube channel for educations, tips, and knowledge. Overall I'm still a freshman to the industry, there's a lot more to be learn but give it shot. I did and reshaped my process and how I looked at data.

Review.Titre: REISift has become the core of my operations.
Review.Contenu: As the owner of Oahu Home Buyers, a company that buys houses in Hawaii and elsewhere, I rely on modern software as the backbone of my operations. REISift has become that core - software that helps me understand my data, improves my team's marketing like nothing else I've used, and stays on top of, even ahead of, industry trends. The development team is always improving the product and helps real estate investors focus their efforts on where it matters most, not chasing shiny objects. REISift has significantly helped improve my company's bottom line.

Review.Titre: Reisift has been a great experience for…
Review.Contenu: Reisift has been a great experience for me so far. It was difficult in the beginning, but just like anything else the more you practice the more efficient you get at it. I was able to closed a deal couple month ago with this software,and planning on closing more as I continue to learn the tools within Reisift. Great data management tool, Excellence customer services, and the constant improvement being made to this software is amazing!

Review.Titre: I have tried almost every CRM out there…
Review.Contenu: I have tried almost every CRM out there and kept switching. REISift literally helps you make money and manage your data more efficiently that would ever think

Review.Titre: REIsift has become a vital software of…
Review.Contenu: REIsift has become a vital software of my business. From the very beginning, Sift has poured its heart into making not only the best data management software out there, but also teaching how to use it along the way.  REIsift has the 1-2 punch for any marketing company to become successful at managing your data and saving your marketing dollars while doing it!

Review.Titre: It changes the game for every company we implement it!
Review.Contenu: I own a VA company that services over 20 investors in different markets, REISift has been a game changer for us and all of our clients using it!It just goes above and beyond.

Review.Titre: The backbone of my company's operations
Review.Contenu: REISift has been the backbone of the data that drives the operations of my Hawaii real estate investment company. It allows me to not only coordinate and coalesce my data from a variety of sources but also understand it on a much deeper level than was previously possible. It's become an integral asset.

Review.Titre: REISift is exceptional...
Review.Contenu: REISift is an exceptional sales & marketing platform as well as a great company to work with. They are always striving to enhance their products and have excellent customer service! I highly suggest taking one of their challenges which will greatly help you understand the true power of the platform!

Review.Titre: REISift changed the direction of my…
Review.Contenu: REISift changed the direction of my business. Not only did the FREE info course change my entire perspective on data but within a month my REISift account was giving me sniper-precision marketing data and effortless ways to implement direct to seller contact. Not only did REISift clean up & optimize my infrastructure but just off the free content my mind was opened to the core components of this business and how to maneuver effectively. Can’t advocate this more

Review.Titre: The rep assisted me with having a…
Review.Contenu: The rep assisted me with having a better understanding of how to use the product. Questions I had, during our session, were answered and he directed me on where to turn if i had more questions. Great service, Great job!

Review.Titre: 10/10 REISift is the best tool to have in your REI Business
Review.Contenu: REISift is a game changer! It single handedly saves me tons of money and time marketing monthly. It also give me a clarity over my data you can’t get anywhere else. That clarity allows me to get more deals with less money giving me more ROI from marketing. 10/10 REISift is the best tool to have in your REI Business

Review.Titre: I had worked with other data company's…
Review.Contenu: I had worked with other data company's and by far REISift the best task data/CRM company to date. What I really love about REISift is how they listen to our needs to get the most out from our data/CRM. I Highly recommend REISift for your Data/CRM needs. It's only going to get better jump on.

Review.Titre: Second to none Platform/CRM
Review.Contenu: Second to none Platform/CRM, CEO, support and community. Pivotal point in my real estate marketing career. The absolutely only way you should be managing your data. 10 out of 10

Review.Titre: The best data management platform in…
Review.Contenu: The best data management platform in REI.  It gives you so many ways to slice and dice your data.  Also, it is the best way to track your marketing.  The technical support it out standing and the free training they offer for this platform is the greates.

Review.Titre: Hands down the BEST CRM I have ever…
Review.Contenu: Hands down the BEST CRM I have ever used.... And I have used dozens. I was a little apprehensive at first to be honest.. thinking that this was just a glorified excel sheet, BUT now.. I WILL NEVER NOT USE REIsift. It has really organized our work flow and is so  easy to follow. It is more than I could have ever imagined. They have training videos on everything, and the support staff is the best out of all of the other platforms. They are constantly adding new items/systems to make us better as well. If I had to cut anywhere in the business REIsift would be the last thing to go. I can not picture working with out it. Use it. You will not regret it.

Review.Titre: Scale your business
Review.Contenu: If you want to take your business to the next level, you need REISIFT. It might be confusing in the beginning but once you dedicated time to learn how to use all this tools. Get ready to 10x your business.

Review.Titre: A whole new perspective on data.
Review.Contenu: A whole new perspective on data and marketing.REI Sift and the methodology taught by Tyler is incredible! It's given me a structure to follow and completely changed my perspective on lists, data and marketing.

Review.Titre: Excellent CRM and Marketing Platform
Review.Contenu: Excellent platform, organized and very well thought out. If interested, definitely take the Data to Dollars challenge, the course was very well structured, learned so many ideas that I plan on implementing in my business.Rich

Review.Titre: Great program to keep the property…
Review.Contenu: Great program to keep the property records/data organized, love the phone number tagging, support and training of how to run a successful business. The training available is way more in-depth than what I've experienced elsewhere, even including a Mastermind. It's a complex program that you need to take the time to learn to fully leverage it and I highly recommend doing so!

Review.Titre: 5X Increase In Revenue From REISift
Review.Contenu: REISift transformed my business overall allowing me to run at lower margins, less marketing spend and really being niche on my data. Having this platforms with the constant improvements really does give the investor an edge in there market. Running data analysis and being able to see who we're not reaching is a big thing to take advantage of and try to touch base on those prospects we're not able to get a hold of on the phone. From 2020 getting let go from my W2 income and going full time. I was able to utilize REI Sift we we're able to go from 58K in 2020 with top line revenue to ending 2021 with 318.3K in revenue with just myself and a virtual assistant. Couldn't be happier with the solution they provide and will continue to use them with my marketing endeavors.Not only does Tyler Austin have a great system he helped put in place a ALGC (Auto Lead Gen Challenge) so you understand how to work on your business and not only in it. Something that really helped me when I joined his class when he first created the program in June 2020 for the ALGC. Lear about REISift and it truly is a game changer for your business.

Review.Titre: I couldn't be happier with how REISift…
Review.Contenu: I couldn't be happier with how REISift has helped me organize the lead I market to. I love how it syncs with CallTools and look forward to more features to come. Always improving and innovating!

Review.Titre: You guys are great!
Review.Contenu: You guys are great!! I suck lol! I got upset with tyler a year and a half ago because I couldnt figure things out fast enough in my brain. So i sit on the sidelines and watch success after success, and try to regain my focus. The systems has been working for everyone that really applies it. I'm going to get it this year!!

Review.Titre: The ONLY software that let's your MASTER your data
Review.Contenu: This is literally the first software ANY & EVERY real estate related business should have in their tech stack.Although it's an incredible crm don't let the "CRM" label deter you from testing it out thinking I already have that (and be ready to quickly realize that you have been missing out this whole time).Their data management features are first in class and can be integrated with any other CRM or software out there.With that said, here are my 3 favorite features:1) REI sift check ALL MY DATA every month for vacancies. (The money saved from acquiring this data alone is enough to pay for the software)2) It automatically separates incomplete/business/entities for our team to clean and get better results from our skiptracing. (Must people ignore/exclude this type of date a.k.a. great source of leads with minimal to no competition)3) Phone tags - this is a game-changer as far as gathering insight from your marketing. Every other software only lets you tag the overall contact/property. Being able to discard a phone (without deleting it to prevent marketing to it again) is just FREGGIN EPIC!Any serious real estate business should master data and REI Sift is the ONLY software that allows you to do so.Give it a shot... trust me, you won't look back.

Review.Titre: REIsift - #1 tool for data management and marketing
Review.Contenu: REIsift is a pivotal tool for any real estate investment company that is consistently marketing. I have been using REISift for almost 3 years and I can't imagine running my business without it.

Review.Titre: This platform has allowed me to take my…
Review.Contenu: This platform has allowed me to take my business to a whole different level! Their services are amazing and I haven't seen them anywhere else in the industry. I will be a customer for a long time!!

Review.Titre: Tyler is an amazing person
Review.Contenu: Tyler is an amazing person. He is so knowledgeable and has built a great platform. I love everything he has built and he continues to pour into the community.

Review.Titre: REISift has been a lifesaver for my…
Review.Contenu: REISift has been a lifesaver for my real estate business in how I manage and bring in data in for marketing. Prior to REISift I was managing all my marketing and data using Google Sheets and over time it became overwhelming to keep track of things and wasted a ton of money with Skip Tracing. The other aspects of REISift offers such as the list stacking, the ability to tag records and phone numbers, and the ability to get as granular as possible with leads that I have not been able to reach  have all been essential in my business. I would highly recommend  this tool for anyone in the real estate space looking for a way to manage their marketing and data.

Review.Titre: REISIFT is the best CRM I could ask…
Review.Contenu: REISIFT is the best CRM I could ask for. If you want a system that captures every single prospect in the best way possible, while helping you identify leads with the highest potential, thus saving you time and money marketing to what matters most, this is the system for you.  Not only is this system an incredible system, but there is a very powerful community behind it that shares more experiences and information than one could imagine, so that whenever you run into an issue, there is someone who has probably handled that before or will work with you to figure it out.

Review.Titre: Very happy with this platform
Review.Contenu: Very happy with this platform, its a deeper look into data that i never looked at before. Tyler and sift team are legit. Highly Recommended

Review.Titre: I've been with REIsift since the… the first few months of launch
Review.Contenu: I've been with REIsift since the beginning & the amount of effort customer service & improvements & improvements by listening to their customer is absolutely stupendous.We went from literally blank marketing & driving around trying to find prospects, to targeting down leads that brang in bigger profits, with mind blowing lower, lower, marketing. Which their continued education & bi-weekly lives helped so much with for full clear understanding on the already user friendly platform. Tyler Austin the owner is always very active in the FB community, answering all & every question; with a nature of keep ppl focused, accountable, & growing within themselves for the business If you can't tell, I'll simply never put this ever evolving platform down.

Review.Titre: The best platform for understanding
Review.Contenu: The best platform for understanding, sorting, organizing and strategizing your data on a granular level. Creator is highly active in Fb group and truly cares about adding the best features. Strong community, support and ongoing education. Highly recommended

Review.Titre: When you have to pick one start here
Review.Contenu: Easily the best subscription that we have in our business and there is a laundry list of them. From the functions, the purpose and support, it’s in a league of its own. Highly recommend. We have the business plan.

Review.Titre: Literally the best real estate software…
Review.Contenu: Literally the best real estate software ever made. There’s a ton of education that comes with for free. There isn’t a better way to do real estate. I will never leave this platform.

Review.Titre: Amazing software- the more time I…
Review.Contenu: Amazing software- the more time I invest in learning the system, the more we get out of it. Absolutely love REIsift

Review.Titre: Amazing product
Review.Contenu: Amazing product! Bringing REIsift into my business has helped clean up loose ends I was doing but with more work to sort through the mess.

Review.Titre: REISift helped me become successful in real estate
Review.Contenu: REISift is the foundation of my business and a main reason I am able to achieve continued success. The software empowers you to analyze your property data to find the most motivated sellers, and create effective marketing sequences to get in touch with them and close deals. With the education they provide, constant software improvements (unbelievable how fast they innovate), and supportive community, they do everything they can to help you build a successful business. Highly recommend starting with the AutoLead Generation Challenge, you'll see exactly what I'm talking about. If you are serious business owner who is willing to put in the work to learn the platform, REISift will be one of the best investments you make.

Review.Titre: Best Sales & Marketing CRM
Review.Contenu: Super great marketing software! Great for keeping records and campaigns organized, various integrations with other marketing tools make keeping track of records and their market dispositions easy, plus the community is all about helping each other grow! 10/10

Review.Titre: Reisift is a must for your business one…
Review.Contenu: Reisift is a must for your business one of the best tools out there also you can't beat the education that Tyler gives .

Review.Titre: Rei Sift is a really great product
Review.Contenu: Rei Sift is a really great product. Once you learn the systems and process you will be set up for success. There is a learning curve, but once you grasp how great this product is you will be grateful that you went through with it. Highly recommend and the community is amazing!

Review.Titre: This product is one of those essentials…
Review.Contenu: This product is one of those essentials you gotta have if you want to build a true business and have better data management and insight.

Review.Titre: REI Sift is literally changing the CRM…
Review.Contenu: REI Sift is literally changing the CRM and data game for Real Estate professionals. So glad I found Tyler and his product as it truly is a game changer.
